sentences.english: And today his campaign expects more super delegates will be announcing their support for Obama. Mara Liasson, NPR News, Washington.
sentences.chinese: 今天在競選中他期待更多超級代表的選票。

sentences.english: Mr. Prasart hasn’t neglected the more modern, Western-facing Thailand in his collections.
sentences.chinese: P先生沒有忽略更能代表現代西式泰國的藏品。

sentences.english: This is the color of hopefulness, and of our connection to nature.
sentences.chinese: 這種顏色代表着希望，以及我們和自然的關聯。

sentences.english: Japan is hosting the meeting of delegates from the so-called G8, or group of eight industrialized nations.
sentences.chinese: 日本主持了八國集團代表會議。

sentences.english: The Premier deputed the Foreign Minister to act as his deputy.
sentences.chinese: 總理委派外交部長作爲他的代表。

sentences.english: Figure12 represents a typical die for extruding tubing.
sentences.chinese: 圖釋12代表了擠出管材的典型模具。

sentences.english: The inclusion of any link to other websites does not imply endorsement by the Nestlé Group.
sentences.chinese: 將其他網站置於連結內不代表雀巢集團對其認可。

sentences.english: We are looking for energetic candidates with good caliber to join Shanghai Representative Office.
sentences.chinese: 我們誠聘充滿活力及有才能的人士加入上海代表處。

sentences.english: The Folk Songs of Northern Shaanxi is the most representative artistic form ofthe Loess Culture.
sentences.chinese: 陝北民歌是黃土文化中最具代表性的藝術形式。

sentences.english: Each class elects two students to represent them on the School Council.
sentences.chinese: 每班選出兩個學生代表參加學生會。

sentences.english: Using this function, we can get more representational eigenvector from email.
sentences.chinese: 利用此函數可提取到更具有代表性的郵件特徵向量。

sentences.english: Glaxo To Cut US Sales Reps For Avandia?
sentences.chinese: 葛蘭素可能削減美國的文迪雅銷售代表？

sentences.english: Saturday was the representative work of periodicals of civil literature in early Minguo.
sentences.chinese: 《禮拜六》是民國初年市民文學期刊的代表作。

sentences.english: This link represents the network access that the server provides to the virtual system.
sentences.chinese: 該鏈接代表了服務器提供給虛擬機系統的網絡訪問。

sentences.english: Each rank of the peerage was represented.
sentences.chinese: 每個貴族階級都有代表。

sentences.english: A weight in percentage represents the degree of similarity.
sentences.chinese: 百分比形式的權重代表的是相似度。
